meaningMnemonic: If someone puts a <radical>blade</radical> to your <radical>heart</radical>, you're going to have a rough time. They leave it there, for a long long time. They aren't going to cut you, but you can't move. You have to <kanji>endure</kanji> the pain and uncomfortableness of the situation.
readingMnemonic: This is all a part of your <reading>nin</reading>ja (にん) training. You must learn to stay totally still, without breathing. This is how they train you. If you can <kanji>endure</kanji> this you can endure anything, plus you can stay really still, which is good for ninjas.
